info.title: WEBAPI
info.description: BISK API (Masters & Posting via SAP B1 Service Layer)

post.summary: Authenticate user and return a JWT.
post.description:
Overview
Validates credentials and returns a signed JSON Web Token.
Request (mandatory fields only)
    
							{
							"username": "api.admin",
							"password": "P@ssw0rd!"
							}
Response Example
Code Example
200 
            
											{
											"success": true,
											"token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9*********",
											"message": "Login successful"
											}
401 
            
											{
											"success": false,
											"token": null,
											"message": "Invalid username or password"
											}

200.description: Returns JWT if credentials are valid.

post.description:
Overview POST /posting/items
Creates a new Inventory Item in SAP B1 via Service Layer.
Required fields ItemMaster
  • ```itemCode``` string
  • ```itemName``` string
  • ```itemsGroupCode``` number
Request application/json 
      
								{
								"itemCode": "INV-100731",
								"itemName": "Notebook A5",
								"itemsGroupCode": 105,
								"barCode": "1234567890123"
								"inventoryItem": "Y",
								"salesItem": "Y",
								"purchaseItem": "Y",
								"uomGroupEntry": 1
								}
Success 201 Created 
        
									{
									"success": true,
									"data": { "itemCode": "INV-100731", "itemName": "Notebook A5" },
									"error": null
									}
Error 400 Bad Request 
        
									{
									"success": false,
									"data": null,
									"error": "Invalid item group"
									}

patch.description:
Auth

JWT in Authorization header.

Mandatory fields

Path parameter: itemCode. Body may contain any subset of fields (partial update).

Request example 
{
  "itemName": "Blue Pen - New",
  "barCode": "9999999999999"
}

Success (204 No Content)

(no content)

Error (404/400/500) example

{
  "success": false,
  "data": null,
  "error": "Item not found"
}

post.description:
Overview POST /posting/bp
Creates a BP (student) record in SAP B1 via Service Layer.
Required fields
string
```cardCode```
string
```cardName```
string
```U_Academic```
enum
```cardType``` (e.g., ```cCustomer```)
Request application/json 
      
								{
								"cardCode": "STU-0001",
								"cardName": "Ali Khan",
								"cardType": "cCustomer",
								"U_Academic": "2025-2026",
								}
Success 201 Created 
        
									{
									"success": true,
									"data": { "studentCode": "STU-0001", "studentName": "Ali Khan" },
									"error": null
									}
Error 400 Bad Request 
        
									{
									"success": false,
									"data": null,
									"error": "Duplicate BP code"
									}

patch.description:
Overview PATCH /posting/bp/{cardCode}
Updates one or more fields of an existing BP.
Requirements
  • Path param: ```cardCode```
  • Body: any subset of updatable fields (partial)
Request application/json 
      
								{
								"cardName": "Ali Khan (Updated)"
								}
Success 200 OK 
        
									{
									"success": true,
									"data": { "studentCode": "STU-0001", "studentName": "Ali Khan (Updated)" },
									"error": null
									}
Error 404 Not Found 
        
									{
									"success": false,
									"data": null,
									"error": "BP not found"
									}
Error 400 Bad Request 
        
									{
									"success": false,
									"data": null,
									"error": "Invalid payload"
									}

post.description:
Auth

JWT in Authorization header.

Mandatory fields

  • docDate (ISO8601)
  • docDueDate (ISO8601)
  • cardCode (string)
  • At least one documentLines item with:
    • itemCode (string)
    • quantity (number)
    • warehouseCode (string)
Basic Request example 
{
  "docDate": "2025-09-10T14:00:00Z",
  "docDueDate": "2025-09-10T14:00:00Z",
  "cardCode": "C0001",
  "documentLines": [
    { "itemCode": "ITM-001", "quantity": 2, "unitPrice": 50.0}
  ]
}
Request example 2 
{
  "docDate": "2025-09-28T00:00:00",
  "docDueDate": "2025-12-28T00:00:00",
  "taxDate": "2025-09-28T00:00:00",
  "cardCode": "H230199",
  "comments": "Sales order with installments",
  "series": null,
  "documentLines": [
    {
      "itemCode": "INV-100731",
      "quantity": 10,
      "unitPrice": 50,
      "discountPercent": 5
    },
    {
      "itemCode": "INV-100731",
      "quantity": 5,
      "unitPrice": 100,
      "discountPercent": 0
    }
  ]
}

Success (200) example

{
  "success": true,
  "data": { "documentEntry": 123, "docNumber": 456 },
  "error": null
}

Error (400/500) example

{
  "success": false,
  "data": null,
  "error": "Item ITM-001 not found"
}

Auth

JWT in Authorization header.

Mandatory fields

  • docDate (ISO8601)
  • docDueDate (ISO8601)
  • cardCode (string)
  • At least one documentLines item with:
    • itemCode (string)
    • quantity (number)
    • warehouseCode (string)
Basic Request example 
{
  "docDate": "2025-09-28",
  "docDueDate": "2025-09-10T14:00:00Z",
  "cardCode": "C20000",
  "documentLines": [
    { "itemCode": "ITM-002", "quantity": 5 }
  ]
}
Request example (copy-from base delivery + installments) 
{
  "docDate": "2025-09-28T00:00:00",
  "docDueDate": "2025-12-28T00:00:00",
  "cardCode": "H230199",
  "comments": "Invoice created with base reference and installments",
  "series": null,
  "taxDate": "2025-09-28T00:00:00",
  "documentLines": [
    {
      "itemCode": "INV-100731",
      "quantity": 10,
      "unitPrice": 50,
      "discountPercent": 5,
      "warehouseCode": "BISK-001",
      "baseType": 17,
      "baseEntry": 1201,
      "baseLine": 0
    },
    {
      "itemCode": "INV-100731",
      "quantity": 5,
      "unitPrice": 100,
      "discountPercent": 0,
      "warehouseCode": "BISK-001",
      "baseType": 17,
      "baseEntry": 1201,
      "baseLine": 1
    }
  ],
  "documentInstallments": [
    { "dueDate": "2025-10-28T00:00:00", "total": 500 },
    { "dueDate": "2025-11-28T00:00:00", "total": 500 },
    { "dueDate": "2025-12-28T00:00:00", "total": 700 }
  ]
}

Note: baseType typically uses SAP B1 object type (e.g., 15 = Delivery, 17 = Sales Order). Adjust according to your flow.

Success (200) example

{
  "success": true,
  "data": { "documentEntry": 234, "docNumber": 789 },
  "error": null
}

Error (400/500) example

{
  "success": false,
  "data": null,
  "error": "Base document missing"
}

Auth

JWT in Authorization header.

Mandatory fields

  • docDate (ISO8601)
  • docDueDate (ISO8601)
  • cardCode (string)
  • At least one documentLines item with:
    • itemCode (string)
    • quantity (number)
    • warehouseCode (string)
Basic Request example 
{
  "docDate": "2025-09-28",
  "docDueDate": "2025-09-28",
  "cardCode": "C20000",
  "documentLines": [
    { "itemCode": "ITM-003", "quantity": 2 }
  ]
}
Request example (credit against base invoice + installments) 
{
  "docDate": "2025-09-28T00:00:00",
  "docDueDate": "2025-12-28T00:00:00",
  "cardCode": "H230199",
  "comments": "Credit note referencing AR Invoice, with installments",
  "series": null,
  "taxDate": "2025-09-28T00:00:00",
  "documentLines": [
    {
      "itemCode": "INV-100731",
      "quantity": 3,
      "unitPrice": 100,
      "discountPercent": 0,
      "warehouseCode": "BISK-001",
      "baseType": 13,
      "baseEntry": 20045,
      "baseLine": 1
    }
  ],
  "documentInstallments": [
    { "dueDate": "2025-10-28T00:00:00", "total": 150},
    { "dueDate": "2025-11-28T00:00:00", "total": 150},
    { "dueDate": "2025-12-28T00:00:00", "total": 200}
  ]
}

Note: baseType uses SAP B1 object type (e.g., 13 = AR Invoice). Provide correct baseEntry/baseLine from the target base document.

Success (201) example

{
  "success": true,
  "data": { "documentEntry": 345, "docNumber": 900 },
  "error": null
}

Error (400/500) example

{
  "success": false,
  "data": null,
  "error": "Invoice not found for base entry"
}

Auth

JWT in Authorization header.

Mandatory fields

  • docType (e.g., rCustomer)
  • docDate (ISO8601)
  • cardCode (string)
  • At least one of:
    • paymentInvoices (apply to invoices)
    • cashSum/transferSum/paymentCreditCards
Request example — cash only 
{
  "docType": "rCustomer",
  "docDate": "2025-09-28",
  "cardCode": "C20000",
  "cashAccount": "110010",
  "cashSum": 500.0,
"paymentInvoices": [
    { "docEntry": 20101, "sumApplied": 1000.0 }
  ]
}
Request example — apply to invoice + bank transfer 
{
  "docType": "rCustomer",
  "docDate": "2025-09-28T00:00:00",
  "cardCode": "C20000",
  "transferAccount": "120020",
  "transferSum": 300.0,
  "transferDate": "2025-09-28T00:00:00",
  "paymentInvoices": [
    { "docEntry": 20045, "sumApplied": 300.0 }
  ],
  "paymentCreditCards": []
}
Request example — credit card capture 
{
  "docType": "rCustomer",
  "docDate": "2025-09-28T00:00:00",
  "cardCode": "C20000",
  "paymentInvoices": [
    { "docEntry": 20101, "sumApplied": 1000.0 }
  ],
  "paymentCreditCards": [
    {
      "creditCard": 1,
      "creditAcct": "130030",
      "creditCardNumber": "411111******1111",
      "cardValidUntil": "2026-12-31T00:00:00",
      "voucherNum": "AUTH-998877",
      "creditSum": 1000.0
    }
  ]
}

Notes:

  • paymentInvoices[].docEntry is the target A/R Invoice entry; sumApplied is the amount to clear.
  • Supply either cashSum, transferSum, and/or paymentCreditCards. You can combine them.

Success (200) example

{
  "success": true,
  "data": { "documentEntry": 567, "docNumber": 902 },
  "error": null
}

Error (400/500) example

{
  "success": false,
  "data": null,
  "error": "Invoice 20045 is not open"
}

Auth

JWT in Authorization header.

Mandatory fields

  • docType (e.g., rCustomer / Customer / refund)
  • docDate (ISO8601)
  • cardCode (string)
  • At least one of:
    • paymentInvoices (apply to target docs)
    • cashSum/transferSum/paymentCreditCards
Request example — Csutomer cash 
{
  "docType": "rCustomer",
  "docDate": "2025-09-28",
  "cardCode": "V10000",
  "cashAccount": "210010",
  "cashSum": 250.0
}
Request example — settle Csutomer invoice via bank transfer 
{
  "docType": "rCustomer",
  "docDate": "2025-09-28T00:00:00",
  "cardCode": "V10000",
  "transferAccount": "220020",
  "transferSum": 500.0,
  "transferDate": "2025-09-28T00:00:00",
  "paymentInvoices": [
    { "docEntry": 51022, "sumApplied": 500.0 }
  ],
  "paymentCreditCards": []
}
Request example — refund to customer via credit card 
{
  "docType": "rCustomer",
  "docDate": "2025-09-28T00:00:00",
  "cardCode": "C20000",
  "paymentInvoices": [],
  "paymentCreditCards": [
    {
      "creditCard": 1,
      "creditAcct": "230030",
      "creditCardNumber": "411111******1111",
      "cardValidUntil": "2027-06-30T00:00:00",
      "voucherNum": "REF-445566",
      "creditSum": 300.0
    }
  ]
}

Notes:

  • For refunds to customers, you may not have target invoices; post via cash/transfer/credit card components as appropriate.

Success (200) example

{
  "success": true,
  "data": { "documentEntry": 678, "docNumber": 903 },
  "error": null
}

Error (400/500) example

{
  "success": false,
  "data": null,
  "error": "No Matching Records Found"
}
